snippet: A black bear that had been spotted lurking around Montclair, N.J., was caught on Tuesday, ending the school district’s suspension of all outdoor activities.
abstract: Black bear that had been spotted lurking around Montclair, NJ, is caught, ending the school district’s suspension of all outdoor activities.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and KATE ZERNIKE

lead_paragraph: A black bear that had been spotted lurking around Montclair, N.J., was caught on Tuesday, ending the school district’s suspension of all outdoor activities.

headline.seo: After Bear Is Caught in Montclair, Students Are Allowed Outside
headline.main: Bear’s Visit Keeps Children Inside and a Town Buzzing
headline.print_headline: Bear’s Visit Keeps Children Inside and a Town Buzzing
